title: Robben Island
summary: Robben Island (Afrikaans: Robbeneiland) is an island in Table Bay, 6.9 kilometres (4.3Â mi) west of the coast of Bloubergstrand, north of Cape Town, South Africa. It takes its name from the Dutch word for seals (robben), hence the Dutch/Afrikaans name Robbeneiland, which translates to Seal(s) Island.
